00023 #include <stdio.h>
00024 #include <stdlib.h>
00025 #include <avr/io.h>x
00026 #include <avr/interrupt.h>
00027 #include <string.h>
00028 
00029 #include "event_handler.h"
00030 #include "remote_control.h"
00031 
00033 #define FLAG_REMOTE_CONTROL_MODE_ACTIVE 0
00034 
00036 unsigned char remote_control_flags;
00037 
00039 void remote_control_activate_remote_mode(void) {
00040         remote_control_flags |= (1<<FLAG_REMOTE_CONTROL_MODE_ACTIVE);
00041 }
00042 
00044 void remote_control_deactivate_remote_mode(void) {
00045         remote_control_flags &= ~(1<<FLAG_REMOTE_CONTROL_MODE_ACTIVE);
00046 }
00047 
00050 unsigned char remote_control_get_remote_mode(void) {
00051         return((remote_control_flags & (1<<FLAG_REMOTE_CONTROL_MODE_ACTIVE)) >> FLAG_REMOTE_CONTROL_MODE_ACTIVE);
00052 }
00053 
00056 void remote_control_parse_button(unsigned char button) {
00057         switch (button) {
00058                 default:
00059                         break;
00060         }
00061 }
00062 
00067 void remote_control_parse_command(unsigned char command, unsigned char length, char *data) {
00068         switch(command) {
00069                 case REMOTE_CONTROL_ACTIVATE_MODE:
00070                         remote_control_activate_remote_mode();
00071                         break;
00072                 case REMOTE_CONTROL_DEACTIVATE_MODE:
00073                         remote_control_deactivate_remote_mode();
00074                 case REMOTE_CONTROL_BUTTON_PRESSED:
00075                         if (length > 0)
00076                                 remote_control_parse_button(data[0]);
00077                         break;
00078                 default:
00079                         break;
00080         }
00081 }
